channel.title: Need old stats of third age mage and range armor?
channel.description: It seems like I can't find the old stats of each piece of armor of the mage and range armor and wondering if you guys can help me out with this. What I'm looking for is the stats such as this [code]item = 14514 Third-age kiteshield A ancient kiteshield 100000000 100000000 100000000 0 0 0 -10 -4 63 65 61 -3 63 0 0[/code] but for all the range and mage armor. Thanks for your guys help
